t: Amazon Boston office welcomes first 2,000 employees
s: June 3, 2022 - Amazon's Boston Tech Hub will be home to more than 2,000 employees. The new 430,000-square-foot office is located in the Seaport's new Harbor Way park, just blocks from the waterfront.
